glsa.title: eGroupWare: XSS and SQL injection vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: eGroupWare is affected by several SQL injection and cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities.

background.p: eGroupWare is a suite of web-based group applications including calendar, address book, messenger and email.

description.p: Multiple SQL injection and cross-site scripting vulnerabilities have been found in several eGroupWare modules.

impact.p: An attacker could possibly use the SQL injection vulnerabilities to gain information from the database. Furthermore the cross-site scripting issues give an attacker the ability to inject and execute malicious script code or to steal cookie based authentication credentials, potentially compromising the victim's browser.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
